title: The read syscall test step
description: The read syscall test step runs the read system call with the provided arguments

fd.description: The file descriptor referencing the file the system call reads from

buffer.description: The buffer acting as container for the data read from the file referenced by 'fd'. If empty or not provided, it defaults as specified in the default section

len.description: The buffer length. If '0' or not provided, it defaults as specified in the default section
len.default: The size of 'buffer' if size of 'buffer' > 0; else '0'
